title: 4-Year Integrated Teacher Education Program (ITEP) B.Sc.-B.Ed. Admission 2023-24

notice.summary: Applications invited for counselling rounds for admission to the 4-Year ITEP B.Sc.-B.Ed. program at NIT Agartala.

eligibility.academic: Class XII (10+2) or equivalent with minimum 50% in best five subjects including Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
eligibility.state_of_eligibility: Based on the state from where Class XII (or equivalent) was first passed; special rules for KVS/NVS schools

online_application.login_credentials: Application ID and password sent via email
online_application.submission: Filled online form generates PDF to be printed and brought on reporting day
documents_required: Class XII mark sheet/grade card and pass certificate
online_application.document_instructions: All documents must be scanned into a single PDF file. Certificates not in English/Hindi require attested translation.

selection_procedure: Based on total score in NCET-2023
Tie-breaker order: Physics > Mathematics > Chemistry marks

tentative_schedule.event: Start of registration, online application, and payment
Last date for submission of online application
Publication of provisionally selected candidates Round 1
Acceptance of allotted seat via MIS Portal Round 1
Publication of provisionally selected candidates Round 2
Acceptance of allotted seat via MIS Portal Round 2

fee_details.payment_mode: MIS portal as seat acceptance fee
fee_details.note: Non-payment or incomplete process leads to seat cancellation

general_instructions: Contact Chief Warden for hostel/mess accommodation and fees: chiefwardennita@gmail.com
